name: Donata Kalnenaite
bio: Donata Kalnenaite is a licensed attorney focusing on privacy and technology law. She is a Certified Information Privacy Professional and the President of Termageddon, LLC, a company that generates Privacy Policies, Terms of Service, and more for small business websites. Donata is the Vice-Chair of the American Bar Association's ePrivacy Committee and the Chair of the Chicago Chapter of the International Association of Privacy Professionals.
